name: MASH Pro
description:
Remember the classic fortune telling game MASH (mansion, apartment, shack, house)?

MASH Pro gives you the most control of your mash stories and lets you create super long stories that will make you laugh out loud.

Pick from 15 questions such as:
+ Who will you marry?
+ Where will you honeymoon?
+ Where will you live?
+ What type of car will you drive?
+ What will your do for a living?
+ What pet will you have?
+ What will you go to college?

FEATURES:
+ 'More Questions' - MASH Pro has the most questions of any MASH on the Android market

+ 'Pick Questions' - MASH Pro is the only MASH that let's you customize your story by choosing the questions

+ 'Random' - You will LOL by hitting random to get top celebrity and funny choices. It is the fast way to marry Justin Bieber :)

+ 'Share' - Once you have the perfect story, brag to your peeps about it

+ It's fun to play MASH Pro with friends or solo

Just like magic 8 ball and paper fortune teller, MASH will time warp your phone right back to the 80's with a classic game that will never go out of style.

Find out who will be your next boyfriend. Will you live in Paris, Los Angeles, London, or Omaha? Will you own a pretty pet salon, snowboard, or be a royal princess when you grow up? Only this classic 80's game can tell.

Hope you get a mansion!
